content: When JFK was POTUS and hired his brother as AG that prompted the republicans to enact the nepotism laws but now that their “GOD”has infested the WH with his family not a peep out of them.Trump is robbing the country blind by violating the emoluments clause and still nothing from the cuckarachas in the Congress.Soon there will be the changing of the “guards”and it will be a whole new ball game.The abuse of power and disregard for law in the WH needs to be brought to an abrupt end with charges filed.Congress,do your damned job.Hypocrites!
